Communication

Class ServerCommunicationTools.ClientSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • Communication.ServerCommunicationTools.ClientSocket
  • Enclosing class:
    ServerCommunicationTools

    public class ServerCommunicationTools.ClientSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    this class control the server communication for one client to be hold by the server. this thread as all the function to manage a client , and listing to incoming messages
    Author:
    Sefi Erlich
